name: Enumerate Bacterial CFU by Serial Dilution
description: Quantify bacterial concentration (CFU/mL) using serial dilutions and spot plating
run: git clone --depth 1 https://github.com/snap-stanford/Biomni /tmp/biomni && pip install -q -e /tmp/biomni && python /mnt/code/enumerate_bacterial_cfu_by_serial_dilution.py

fields.name: initial_sample_volume_ml
fields.description: Volume of the initial bacterial sample in milliliters

fields.name: estimated_concentration
fields.description: Estimated concentration of bacteria in the initial sample (CFU/mL)

fields.name: dilution_factor
fields.description: Factor by which each dilution reduces the concentration

fields.name: num_dilutions
fields.description: Number of serial dilutions to perform

fields.name: spots_per_dilution
fields.description: Number of replicate spots to plate for each dilution

fields.name: output_file
fields.description: Filename to save the CFU enumeration results
